summary: This document is an email from an Information Governance Officer at Guys and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust, dated 25 October 2023, responding to a subject access request. The officer states they are unable to locate the requester on their hospital system and requests confirmation of attendance and additional identifying information.

persons.name: Information Governance Officer
persons.context: The sender of the email, tasked with handling a subject access request related to the Epstein case, who cannot find the requester in the hospital system.

events.title: Hospital Subject Access Request Follow-up
events.description: An Information Governance Officer emails a requester regarding a subject access request made earlier in the year, stating they cannot locate the requester in the Guys and St Thomas or Royal Brompton hospital systems and requests further identifying information.

events.title: Subject Access Request Submission
events.description: A subject access request related to the Epstein case was made, as referenced in the follow-up email.

locations: Guys and St Thomas System (hospital system)
keyFacts: A subject access request related to the Epstein case was made to Guys and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust, likely seeking medical records.
As of 25 October 2023, the hospital's Information Governance team could not locate the requester in their patient system.
The document indicates ongoing investigative or legal efforts to obtain information from UK hospitals in 2023.
